facets.genresSubtitle: Select a category and explore the programmes.

slowResponse.title: Slow response time
slowResponse.text: We're sorry for long response, we are experiencing a lot of traffic at the moment

timeSearch.allDays: All days of the week in the period
timeSearch.dateSubtitle: Here you can select a specific date and see what was sent that day.
timeSearch.timeMachineSubtitle: Here you can select years, months and days of the week if you are looking for programmes sent in a specific period.
timeSearch.searchCategoriesSubtitle: Select a category and explore the programmes.

search.hitcount: result fund for | results found for
search.nohit: Sorry, we did not find any results matching your search for "{query}"

nohitSubtitle.firstPart: We are sorry that it was not possible to find a result for your search. Not all programmes in the archive are linked to good search words yet, so it may take a few tries to find what you are looking for.
nohitSubtitle.secondPart: Perhaps you have searched for something that has not yet entered the archive or that we are not allowed to show in the archive.
nohitSubtitle.readMore: Read more about what the archive contains.
nohitSubtitle.lastPart: We hope for your understanding and patience - we are working to make the archive material more searchable. Below we have collected some advice about searching, which may help you further.

search.tipsTitle: A few tips for your search
search.title: Title

dataQuantity.firstPart: The graph shows how much material from DR-arkivet you can search from each year. In some periods, there is a lot of material and in others there is little or nothing.
dataQuantity.secondPart: We are constantly working to get more programmes ready to go in the online archive, and therefore the graph will change as more programmes are added.

placeholders.drArchive: Search for example by title, year or category
placeholders.booksAndMaterials: Search title, author, journal, database etc.

searchGuide.title: Advice about searching
searchGuide.subtitle: Perhaps you can improve your search with one of these methods
searchGuide.first: Try using fewer or different keywords

second.line1: Check the spelling. If you're unsure, you can write ? as a substitute for a letter - for example Son?a
second.line2: Then you search both Sonia and Sonja

third.line1: Try writing * at the end of a word, for example forest*
third.line2: Then you search for forest, forest's, forester and so on

searchGuide.fourth: Use searching via date or periode on the frontpage of DR-arkivet, if you have a sense of when the programme was sent

frontpageGuide.title: How do I optimise my search?
frontpageGuide.first: The search function only finds results where your keywords appear in the title or description in exactly the form and spelling you have written them. This means that a search for, for example, tower will not find results that say towers or watchtower.
frontpageGuide.second: If you want to include multiple forms of the search words, you can use * at the end and/or beginning of the word.
frontpageGuide.third: Please note: When you search in the search box, your previous selection of filters will be reset - for example category, channel or time.

record.title: Title
record.copyTitleSuccess: The link has now been copied.
record.copyMessageFailed: The link was not copied to the clipboard. Copy the URL instead.

error.title: Error message

record.loadingFailed: The requested programme could not be loaded.
record.notAllowed: You are not authorized to view this material
record.restricted: SORRY, YOU DO NOT HAVE ACCESS TO THIS PROGRAMME

video.generic: Something went wrong - we can't play the video at the moment

audio.playerInit: The audio player is not available at the moment
audio.generic: Something went wrong - we can't play this audio clip at the moment

bff.notResponsive: Some content on this page could not be retrieved.

solr.notResponsive: There was an error in the system, that we're working to fix as soon as possible. We hope for your understanding and patience

infoError.timeMachine: Period filters are not responding - try again later.
infoError.searchResult: Search result is not responding - try again later.

auth.notAllowedText: This may be because the programme is subject to  copyright or is restricted, for example due to particularly vulnerable contributors.

error.searchfailed: The search request could not be performed
error.malformeduri: Something went wrong with your search terms - try to change some of them

wrongUrl.header: Sorry, we cannot find the page you are looking for :(
wrongUrl.text: Try entering a search in the search box or go to the front page of DR-arkivet to use the various entries to the archive material.
wrongUrl.kbPage: Front page of Royal Danish Library

hero.title: DR-arkiv
hero.subtitle: Royal Danish Library's
hero.explanation: In DR-arkivet, you will find a large amount of DR's self-produced TV and radio programmes from 2006 onwards. We continuously add both newer and older programmes so that the archive becomes bigger and better.
